title: Article n°1
description: Bart: Ay, carumba!Mr. Burns: Thank you, come again. Smithers, release the hounds. Bart: Well, Milhouse. Ready to imitate that Jackass show?  Milhouse: The disclaimers make me want to do it more. Homer: God is teasing me. Just like he teased Moses in the desert.  Marge: *Tested,* Homer. God *tested* Moses.
author: jérémy
